 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֑מֶד‎</span> **proper name, masculine** [[1Chr.8.12|1Chr 8:12]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]] [[BDB#Baer|Baer]], see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁמֶר‎</span> 

<small>Also see: **<big>[[H7763|שׁוֹמֵר]]</big>**</small>

 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁ֫מֶר‎</span> **proper name, masculine** (properly clan-name, compare [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>ZAW v (1885). 166 f.</sup>, compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שמר‎</span> [[BDB#Os|Os]]<sup>13</sup>, but Northern Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii (1885), 14</sup> [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>30</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangGreek">Σεμ</span>(<span class="bdbLangGreek">μ</span>)<span class="bdbLangGreek">ηρ</span>, etc.: 

**1.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> original owner of hill where Samaria was built [[1Kgs.16.24|1Kgs 16:24]] (twice in verse). 

**2.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֑מֶר‎</span> 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** Levite [[1Chr.6.31|1Chr 6:31]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** in Asher [[1Chr.7.34|1Chr 7:34]], [[BDB#A|A]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Σωμηρ</span>; = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁמֵר‎</span> v[[1Chr.7.32|1Chr 7:32]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** in Benjamin [[1Chr.8.12|1Chr 8:12]] [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]]; &gt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁטֶד‎</span> q. v.
